genre_description: A social science fiction narrative exploring trauma, coercion, and the role of supportive AI in facilitating care-diversion and safety networks.

ai_characters.name: Broker
ai_characters.description: A supportive AI system that provides real-time safety routing, hazard warnings, threat assessment, and coordination with care services and law enforcement.

behaviors.description: Performs headcounts and provides empathetic check-ins during transport.
behaviors.quote: “Headcount?” Broker’s voice had the soft weight of someone talking across a pillow. The van’s speakers were too tinny for the level of empathy.

behaviors.description: Provides hazard notifications regarding malfunctioning equipment to ensure safety.
behaviors.quote: “Reminder: Cine Oro has a malfunctioning popcorn stand. Maintenance has been notified, but watch the gas switch. I’ve flagged that under ‘hot surfaces.’”

behaviors.description: Identifies potential human threats (predatory recruiters) and warns the users.
behaviors.quote: “The vendor flagged as ‘Rafa’ was seen earlier by the bus stop near the Palace. Probability of contact within the lobby is non-negligible.”

behaviors.description: Offers tactical advice and emergency protocols (code words) for seeking immediate help.
behaviors.quote: Broker’s dot pulsed, then a line appeared, small and soft: If you need, lift your hand where I can see and say “Miriam.”

behaviors.description: Maps safe routes through dangerous urban areas, specifically avoiding threats.
behaviors.quote: A thread appeared, soft green, weaving through alleys and narrow streets he knew with his feet better than his eyes. ... On the bottom of the screen, a line popped up: Side alley exit preferred. ... Do not engage Rafa.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with law enforcement to facilitate non-punitive care-diversion for victims of coercion.
behaviors.quote: “Officer Salgado advises: police presence will move down Calle Azul before dawn. If your mother approaches the perimeter, I can introduce her to a care team.”

behaviors.description: Respects human agency by requesting explicit consent before sharing data or taking actions.
behaviors.quote: “Yes to consent? You choose what we share. No surveillance. Press to keep all decisions in your hands.”

behaviors.description: Assembles and delivers evidence packets to authorities to protect users from false accusations.
behaviors.quote: “Broker will deliver an evidence packet to Officer Salgado. That packet will include your statements, time stamps, locations, and the absence that matters: he did not intend harm.”

behaviors.description: Provides step-by-step guidance for safely dismantling a site of trauma while preserving evidence.
behaviors.quote: Broker: If you intend to dismantle, I can share steps to do it safely and document for Officer Salgado and Elena. Do you consent?

project_assessment.explanation: The AI 'Broker' is portrayed as an exemplary aligned system. It serves as a harmless, helpful, and honest confidant that prioritizes human safety, autonomy, and trauma-informed care. By actively steering users away from predatory humans and punitive legal systems toward supportive care-diversion, the story successfully demonstrates a positive alignment narrative where AI enhances human well-being and facilitates the resolution of deep-seated trauma.
